attributes.additional_details:
We would like Enfield Council to reinstate plans to go ahead with the 'growing, sustainability and employment skills' project aimed at those with learning difficulties/ physical and sensory impairments and their parents and carers.

There is a significant lack of suitable space within Enfield where such skills can be taught, likewise there is a significant lack of outdoor activities aimed towards this demographic of people helping them to engage in the community.

Enfield Council should approve of those within the community that want to help build bridges so that those who are more socially excluded can build confidence, skills and their parents/carers can also use this space as a place of respite.

Please help us make this a reality for the people who would benefit from the Newbury Allotment Project.
